SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="eb3ba6ed248841bfb68ff7853b347970" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're the one who saved me and my
crew,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] As the director,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd like to say
thank you on behalf of all of us.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eb3ba6ed248841bfb68ff7853b347970" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Unfortunately our camera didn't fare so
well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but that's life![etc:Wait frame="15"/] We could have made
something great here.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Oh well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eb3ba6ed248841bfb68ff7853b347970" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Ha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Wow![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I guess this whole ordeal has
made me—ME—realize something.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Ratings
are important, but they aren't everything.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="b839a559e3b546b7acef49c4f280bb87" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]I just noticed that you look like me![etc:Wait frame="15"/] This
could be great![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We could team up and
be the famous directorial duo![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b839a559e3b546b7acef49c4f280bb87" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]Sorry.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Force of habit.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I always find myself
pitching something...
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="fff714a59a4c4c95b7a56238c6b5beff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Those eyes...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're making me miss my
camera all over again,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] buddy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Talk about
photogenic!
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="85b4d0aba79e4a8fb0041a69c820152e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]I really think you have what it takes to
be a star![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Send me your agent's contact
info when you get a sec.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="61fce2650b9c4da38791821e569e4fa7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Just need to muster up...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]a little more
courage.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Shouldn't be too hard,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="70d4594071624cc7a106dee30458c02d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Thank you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I don't know where I'd be
without you![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What can I say?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your
courage inspired me.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="af12f1d74d8747b39d1d54114ad05448" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal17"/]Muggs[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and I,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] we're starting a whole new
adventure together!
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="ba16fc57eac34884990e0dd48e1d48eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]That's right![etc:Wait frame="8"/] We're starting over![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think
we have enough time.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now we just need
a perfect production plan.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="ac31dd7e0d3641e88e57eede865792db" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I feel like I've been able to reveal to
you parts of my heart that I didn't
even know existed.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="a4aa293060d643be99845cc279a3b08b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Until now, shock-factor journalism has
been my thing,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but maybe I need to revamp
this "Mysterious Death Planet!" project...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a4aa293060d643be99845cc279a3b08b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="AngryFaceOnly"/]It's going to be tough. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]That desire to
capture the most intense and awesome
footage possible is hard to ignore.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a4aa293060d643be99845cc279a3b08b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]But on the other hand, it doesn't seem to
give me the same rush that it used to.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Could I just be stuck in a rut?
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="feba3f77e1a54574b6724c3189292071" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I wouldn't be standing here today if not for
the courage you showed during my rescue.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
This shipwreck has taught me so much...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="feba3f77e1a54574b6724c3189292071" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe that's what I've been
missing all along.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Courage.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The courage to
stand up and take fate into my own hands.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="300d39bf67b941a6984216e39c46d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I've always tried to capture intense and
awesome footage...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]but all that effort is
meaningless without the right subject.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="300d39bf67b941a6984216e39c46d771" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurpriseNoVoice"/]Huh.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Maybe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] in the end,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been saved
in more ways than one!
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="eb9e8bc5587d46eabf555b34c75c47d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]I was so trapped by my obsession for high
ratings and praise,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I never saw what really
mattered in life...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="eb9e8bc5587d46eabf555b34c75c47d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]But now I see![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Success is not in the rush
of a good rating.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's in the seeking of
self-growth and a greater happiness.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="4269561fdca74e2186746fa4e8337ba5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I feel like I've been able to reveal to
you parts of my heart that I didn't
even know existed.
SV024.SV024_Area500_Talk_Scenario_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal25"/][UE:Meta key="b588d863732e4a5fb6bdb43e8452f3bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Thanks for listening.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I think I know what
I need to do next.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b588d863732e4a5fb6bdb43e8452f3bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]By the way, you have a great presence.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I've got this idea for a show called "Bulborb
Breakfast Battle."[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You'd be perfect...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b588d863732e4a5fb6bdb43e8452f3bb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSad"/]Uh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I did it again. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Just forget about that,
OK?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Old habits, you know?
